column5: Hi All, Have a 2004 Princecraft 174 pro series and need to replace all 4 seats. I have the pedestals so just need the seat itself x 4 I've looked online and there are a few good options at Cabela's and Sail but wondering if there's anywhere else I should be looking? I'm hoping to spend no more than $150 a seat. Looking for something high back with good cushion and aluminum hinges (rather than plastic) Any recommendations are appreciated. Thanks, 	FF17
id be ordering online. When the time comes thats how I will be getting mine.
Have you found anywhere specific? Or will you go with bass pro/cabelas/sail?

I had a 17 foot aluminum side console, when I replaced my seats I got them from Cabela's and since them and bass pro are now 1 owner? Chances are the selection is pretty much the same? as are the prices?
Gotta be at least a decade since I was last in Bass Pro (Vaughn) but it seems to me they used to have a decent selection of seats in stock.
bass pro has them but if I were to order new seats that weren't from the factory or have them custom made, I would be looking at bassboatseats.com . they've goit a few options.
Princess Auto for a basic folding cushioned seat, not a lot of color choice but the price is right

I need to replace mine on my boat. Most of them are now completely saturated because of my little sinking issue last summer. One survived by being on a raised deck with a pedestal. So I too am looking for a set of 4 but may wait until next year as I just dropped a grand on a hydraulic steering system to replace my cable steering. The cable filled with water and froze so I don't know if it was still going to be usable so made the decision to upgrade. If the old one is usable I will install it on my friends boat or on another boat I own.

Have a look on Amazon. Here's some that seems to meet your requirements? With a few different colour combinations. I just used "folding boat seats" in the search bar. Many also offer free shipping. Here's a link Wise company seats  Dan.
amazon definitely has some great options, personally for me in a bass boat I am also looking at the BBC boards sponsor https://www.bassboatseats.com/

As I recall Wise seats were what I replaced mine with, didn't have any issues with them. https://www.cabelas.com/browse.cmd?categoryId=734095080&CQ_search=boat+seats&CQ_zstype=REG Don't know who makes their seats, but more options?
Saw this on facebook looks good and I think they are in Quebec   https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100010210663257
turns out bass boat seats.com is directly affiliated with this guy. Same stock, just canadian supplier! Probably where I will end up getting my boat seats from.
